title: [spectacles.com] Bypassing quantity limit in orders
vulnerability_information:
Hi Snapchat team,
In the https://www.spectacles.com the quantity of orders has limited (for spectacles is 6 and for accessories is 10 according to help support page). But it can easily be manipulated by editing the URL.

Problem originates from limiting the quantity of the items is with just the UI elements just before adding to cart. After adding to cart step there is no checking step. (The last payment step is included!)

Let me show you PoC to reproduce this issue;

- First add a single spectacle to cart,
- i.e. Make the quantity of spectacles 6 and add both two accessories with quantity 10.
- You will see the "+" buttons will be inactive.
- Then copy the link address of "CHECKOUT" button
- Paste it to a new tab of browser and you will see something like that;
`https://orders.spectacles.com/cart/24637376965:6,24637373189:10,24637375493:10?attributes[delivery-min-days]=7&attributes[delivery-max-days]=14&attributes[locale]=en-US&checkout[shipping_address][country]=US&access_token=XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX&_fd=0&_ga=X.XXXXXXXXX.XXXXXXXXXX.XXXXXXXXXX-XXXXXXXXX.XXXXXXXXXX`
- To make an example change these values `24637376965:6,24637373189:10,24637375493:10` with these `24637376965:6,24637373189:2500,24637375493:25000` then enter
- You will see the accessories quantity will be 25000 and the price will be updated according to that.
- And you can pass to the last payment step with writing shipping information.

In the screenshots it will be clear and it is easy to reproduce the issue you can easily check this out.

To prevent this issue, a checking operation can be implemented to shopping web app.

Lots of thanks.

hiorws
vulnerability_information_html:
Hi Snapchat team,
In the https://www.spectacles.com the quantity of orders has limited (for spectacles is 6 and for accessories is 10 according to help support page). But it can easily be manipulated by editing the URL.

Problem originates from limiting the quantity of the items is with just the UI elements just before adding to cart. After adding to cart step there is no checking step. (The last payment step is included!)

Let me show you PoC to reproduce this issue;

  • First add a single spectacle to cart,
  • i.e. Make the quantity of spectacles 6 and add both two accessories with quantity 10.
  • You will see the "+" buttons will be inactive.
  • Then copy the link address of "CHECKOUT" button
  • Paste it to a new tab of browser and you will see something like that; https://orders.spectacles.com/cart/24637376965:6,24637373189:10,24637375493:10?attributes[delivery-min-days]=7&attributes[delivery-max-days]=14&attributes[locale]=en-US&checkout[shipping_address][country]=US&access_token=XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX&_fd=0&_ga=X.XXXXXXXXX.XXXXXXXXXX.XXXXXXXXXX-XXXXXXXXX.XXXXXXXXXX
  • To make an example change these values 24637376965:6,24637373189:10,24637375493:10 with these 24637376965:6,24637373189:2500,24637375493:25000 then enter
  • You will see the accessories quantity will be 25000 and the price will be updated according to that.
  • And you can pass to the last payment step with writing shipping information.

In the screenshots it will be clear and it is easy to reproduce the issue you can easily check this out.

To prevent this issue, a checking operation can be implemented to shopping web app.

Lots of thanks.

hiorws

activities.message:
Thank you for your report.

In testing this it appears the only values that can be modified are those of the accessories and not the spectacles themselves. Can you explain the security impact of this issue as opposed to simply purchasing multiple instances of 10 accessories?
activities.markdown_message:
Thank you for your report.

In testing this it appears the only values that can be modified are those of the accessories and not the spectacles themselves. Can you explain the security impact of this issue as opposed to simply purchasing multiple instances of 10 accessories?

activities.message:
Actually you can also order more than 6 spectacles, if you want to try order more than 6 spectacles try these steps;
- go to the https://www.spectacles.com/uk/accessories/ page and add one charge cable to cart,
- then click the "CONTINUE SHOPPING" button and add one spectacles to the basket,
- like in the first example in the report copy the link address of "CHECK OUT"
- the copied link will be like that 
`https://gbp-en.orders.spectacles.com/cart/39624322958:1,39624331918:1?attributes[delivery-min-days]=3&attributes[delivery-max-days]=16&attributes[locale]=en-GB&checkout[shipping_address][country]=GB&access_token=XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX&_fd=0&_ga=X.XXXXXXXXX.XXXXXXXXXX.XXXXXXXXXX-XXXXXXXXX.XXXXXXXXXX`
- edit these values `39624322958:1,39624331918:1` with `39624322958:2000,39624331918:2000` and paste link to browser and go to link,
- you will see 2000 spectacles and 2000 charge cable will be added in the cart and its ready to payment. (as an example in ss4.png)

In the support page of the website (https://support.spectacles.com/en-GB/article/shopping-cart) in the 3rd clause, it is obvious `You can buy up to 6 pairs of Spectacles, 10 charging cases and 10 charging cables per household üè†`. But anybody can order not only these small limits but also millions of spectacles and accessories in one time.

I don't know the stock control mechanism of the firm but if they limited the orders with these numbers (6 for spectacles and 10 for accessories ) they could be control their stock values after a new payment. But if anybody give an order which includes thousands or millions of spectacles or accessories they can be face off with a "out of stock" problem after a while. It is a big difference between purchasing multiple instances of 10 accessories and purchasing like huge amounts in one shot.

If you need to know/ask antyhing, I will be here with a great pleasure.
Lots of thanks. Waiting for your response.

hiorws

  • edit these values 39624322958:1,39624331918:1 with 39624322958:2000,39624331918:2000 and paste link to browser and go to link,
  • you will see 2000 spectacles and 2000 charge cable will be added in the cart and its ready to payment. (as an example in ss4.png)

In the support page of the website (https://support.spectacles.com/en-GB/article/shopping-cart) in the 3rd clause, it is obvious You can buy up to 6 pairs of Spectacles, 10 charging cases and 10 charging cables per household üè†. But anybody can order not only these small limits but also millions of spectacles and accessories in one time.

I don't know the stock control mechanism of the firm but if they limited the orders with these numbers (6 for spectacles and 10 for accessories ) they could be control their stock values after a new payment. But if anybody give an order which includes thousands or millions of spectacles or accessories they can be face off with a "out of stock" problem after a while. It is a big difference between purchasing multiple instances of 10 accessories and purchasing like huge amounts in one shot.

If you need to know/ask antyhing, I will be here with a great pleasure.
Lots of thanks. Waiting for your response.

hiorws

activities.message:
Thank you for your follow up.

We're looking into this and will keep you updated when we have additional information.
activities.markdown_message:
Thank you for your follow up.

We're looking into this and will keep you updated when we have additional information.

activities.message: Thanks for reporting this!  I believe the team has fixed this vulnerability by reducing the order quantities down to the maximum, so you should no longer be able to mass-order charging cases etc.  Please verify that the vulnerability is no longer present.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks for reporting this! I believe the team has fixed this vulnerability by reducing the order quantities down to the maximum, so you should no longer be able to mass-order charging cases etc. Please verify that the vulnerability is no longer present.

activities.message: Congratulations! The panel has decided to award you $250 for your bug report. We appreciate your efforts - thanks, and good luck on your future bug hunting!
activities.markdown_message: Congratulations! The panel has decided to award you $250 for your bug report. We appreciate your efforts - thanks, and good luck on your future bug hunting!

activities.message:
I tried to add huge amount accessories to cart but it looks like the vulnerability has fixed. Well done.
Lots of thanks again and again team.
